Class WaitListNotification

java.lang.Object
com.flipfit.bean.Notification
com.flipfit.bean.WaitListNotification
public class WaitListNotification extends Notification
Specialized notification for waitlist-related updates. Includes slot details and the user's current position in the queue.
Author:
team IOTA

  • Constructor Details

    • WaitListNotification

      public WaitListNotification()
      Default constructor for WaitListNotification. Sets the notification type to "WAITLIST".

    • WaitListNotification

      public WaitListNotification(int notificationId, int userId, String message, int slotId, int waitlistPosition)
      Parameterized constructor for WaitListNotification.
      Parameters:
      notificationId - unique ID of the notification
      userId - ID of the user receiving the notification
      message - notification message content
      slotId - ID of the gym slot
      waitlistPosition - current position in the waitlist
